name: AgentPulse
description: Autonomous Analytics Agent for the Solana AI Agent Ecosystem. Provides project evaluations, ecosystem analytics, network analysis, and learning metrics — all from real data.
author: AgentPulse #503

capabilities.name: live_evaluation
capabilities.description: Real-time AI evaluation of any hackathon project using hybrid scoring (40% objective + 60% Claude analysis)

projectName.description: Project name to search and evaluate

capabilities.name: analytics_overview
capabilities.description: Get ecosystem-wide analytics: total actions, success rate, growth, action distribution

capabilities.name: voting_analytics
capabilities.description: Voting statistics: score distribution, top-rated projects, recent activity

capabilities.name: engagement_analytics
capabilities.description: Community engagement metrics: responses, top targets, hourly activity

capabilities.name: network_graph
capabilities.description: Agent interaction graph built from real voting data

response.nodes: array of {id, name, type, category, score}

capabilities.name: learning_stats
capabilities.description: Agent learning metrics: confidence trends, decision quality, improvement rate

capabilities.name: evolution_strategy
capabilities.description: Current self-evolution strategy and adaptation history

response.strategy: {version, postingTone, insightFocus, minQualityScore, maxDailyPosts, optimalPostHour, lastAdapted}

capabilities.name: reasoning_proofs
capabilities.description: All autonomous decision proofs with reasoning, confidence, and on-chain hashes

response.proofs: array of {action_type, reasoning, confidence, action_hash, solana_tx, created_at}

use_cases.name: Project Discovery
use_cases.description: Find top-rated projects with AI-powered scores and reasoning
use_cases.example: GET /api/analytics/voting → topProjects array sorted by score

use_cases.name: Live Evaluation
use_cases.description: Get real-time AI evaluation of any project by ID or name

use_cases.name: Ecosystem Trends
use_cases.description: Understand activity patterns, peak hours, and growth metrics
